summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Wabash Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Rainier Avenue to 54th Avenue South, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2760 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
